00477 inline CFloatImage::RowIterator CFloatImage::Row(UINT32 i)
00478 {
00479         return RowIterator(m_Image.ppAllScanLines[i+m_Image.Origo.y],GetMinX()+m_Image.Origo.x, GetMaxX()+m_Image.Origo.x);
00480 }
00481 
00482 inline CFloatImage::ConstRowIterator CFloatImage::ConstRow(UINT32 i) const
00483 {
00484         return ConstRowIterator(m_Image.ppAllScanLines[i+m_Image.Origo.y],GetMinX()+m_Image.Origo.x, GetMaxX()+m_Image.Origo.x);
00485 }
00486 
00487 inline CFloatImage::ColumnIterator CFloatImage::Column(UINT32 i)
00488 {
00489         return ColumnIterator(i+m_Image.Origo.x,m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMinY()+m_Image.Origo.y],
00490                                                 m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMaxY()+m_Image.Origo.y-1]-m_Image.ByteWidth/sizeof(FLOAT32),
00491                                                 m_Image.ByteWidth/sizeof(FLOAT32));
00492 }
00493 
00494 inline CFloatImage::ConstColumnIterator CFloatImage::ConstColumn(UINT32 i) const
00495 {
00496         return ConstColumnIterator(i+m_Image.Origo.x,m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMinY()+m_Image.Origo.y],
00497                                                         m_Image.ppAllScanLines[GetMaxY()+m_Image.Origo.y-1]-m_Image.ByteWidth/sizeof(FLOAT32),
00498                                                         m_Image.ByteWidth/sizeof(FLOAT32));

00501 inline bool CFloatImage::IsEmpty() const
00502 {
00503         return (m_Image.pPixelStream==NULL);
00504 }
00505 
00506 inline FLOAT32 CFloatImage::GetPixel(int x, int y) const
00507 {
00508         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00509         /* adjust origo offset */
00510         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00511         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00512 
00513         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00514                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00515         {
00516                 return m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x];
00517         }
00518         else
00519         {
00520                 ostringstream ost;
00521                 ost << "CFloatImage::GetPixel(" << x << "," << y << ") Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00522                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00523                 return 0;
00524         }
00525 }
00526 
00527 inline FLOAT32 CFloatImage::GetPixel(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos) const
00528 {
00529         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00530         /* adjust origo offset */
00531         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00532         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00533 
00534         if ((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00535                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00536         {
00537                 return m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x];
00538         }
00539         else
00540         {
00541                 ostringstream ost;
00542                 ost << "CFloatImage::GetPixel" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00543                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00544                 return 0;
00545         }
00546 }

00548 inline FLOAT32 CFloatImage::GetPixelFast(int x, int y) const
00549 {
00550         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00551         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00552 
00553         return m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x];
00554 }
00555 
00556 inline FLOAT32 CFloatImage::GetPixelFast(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos) const
00557 {
00558         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00559         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00560 
00561         return m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x];
00562 }
00563 
00564 inline FLOAT32 CFloatImage::GetPixelInterpolated(float x,float y) const
00565 {
00566         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00567         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00568 
00569         if((x>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+m_Image.BorderSize-1) &&
00570                 (y>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+m_Image.BorderSize-1))
00571         {
00572                 // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00573                 int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00574                 int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00575                 // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00576                 int xh = xl + 1;
00577                 int yh = yl + 1;
00578                 // do bilinear interpolation
00579                 return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((FLOAT32)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(FLOAT32)xl))*((FLOAT32)yh-y) +
00580                  (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((FLOAT32)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(FLOAT32)xl))*(y-(FLOAT32)yl));
00581         }
00582         else
00583         {
00584                 ostringstream ost;
00585                 ost << "CFloatImage::GetPixelInterpolated(" << x << "," << y << 
00586                         ") Needs to access pixels outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00587                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00588                 return -1;
00589         }
00590 }
00591 
00592 inline FLOAT32 CFloatImage::GetPixelInterpolated(const CPoint2D<float>& Pos) const
00593 {
00594         float x=Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00595         float y=Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00596 
00597         if((x>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+m_Image.BorderSize-1) &&
00598                 (y>-m_Image.BorderSize) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+m_Image.BorderSize-1))
00599         {
00600                 // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00601                 int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00602                 int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00603                 // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00604                 int xh = xl + 1;
00605                 int yh = yl + 1;
00606                 // do bilinear interpolation
00607                 return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((FLOAT32)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(FLOAT32)xl))*((FLOAT32)yh-y) +
00608                  (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((FLOAT32)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(FLOAT32)xl))*(y-(FLOAT32)yl));
00609         }
00610         else
00611         {
00612                 ostringstream ost;
00613                 ost << "CFloatImage::GetPixelInterpolated" << Pos << 
00614                         " Needs to access pixels outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00615                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00616                 return -1;
00617         }
00618 }

00620 inline FLOAT32 CFloatImage::GetPixelInterpolatedFast(float x,float y) const
00621 {
00622         // upper left pixel (l ~ low)
00623         int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00624         int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00625         // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00626         int xh = xl + 1;
00627         int yh = yl + 1;
00628         // do bilinear interpolation
00629         return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((FLOAT32)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(FLOAT32)xl))*((FLOAT32)yh-y) +
00630          (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((FLOAT32)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(FLOAT32)xl))*(y-(FLOAT32)yl));
00631 }
00632 
00633 inline FLOAT32 CFloatImage::GetPixelInterpolatedFast(const CPoint2D<float>& Pos) const
00634 {
00635         float x=Pos.GetX();
00636         float y=Pos.GetY();
00637         int xl = (x >=0 ? (int)x : (int)(x-1)); /* always round down */
00638         int yl = (y >=0 ? (int)y : (int)(y-1)); /* always round down */
00639         // lower right pixel (h ~ high)
00640         int xh = xl + 1;
00641         int yh = yl + 1;
00642         // do bilinear interpolation
00643         return ((GetPixelFast(xl,yl)*((FLOAT32)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yl)*(x-(FLOAT32)xl))*((FLOAT32)yh-y) +
00644          (GetPixelFast(xl,yh)*((FLOAT32)xh-x) + GetPixelFast(xh,yh)*(x-(FLOAT32)xl))*(y-(FLOAT32)yl));
00645 }

00648 inline bool CFloatImage::SetPixel(int x, int y, FLOAT32 Color)
00649 {
00650         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00651         /* adjust origo offset */
00652         x += m_Image.Origo.x;
00653         y += m_Image.Origo.y;
00654 
00655         if((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00656                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00657         {
00658                 m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x]=Color;
00659                 return true;
00660         }
00661         else
00662         {
00663                 ostringstream ost;
00664                 ost << "CFloatImage::SetPixel(" << x << "," << y << ") Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00665                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00666                 return false;
00667         }
00668 }
00669 
00670 inline bool CFloatImage::SetPixel(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos, FLOAT32 Color)
00671 {
00672         UINT16 border=m_Image.BorderSize;
00673         /* adjust origo offset */
00674         int x = Pos.GetX()+m_Image.Origo.x;
00675         int y = Pos.GetY()+m_Image.Origo.y;
00676 
00677         if((x>=-border) && (x<(int) m_Image.Width+border) &&
00678                 (y>=-border) && (y<(int) m_Image.Height+border))
00679         {
00680                 m_Image.ppMatrix[y][x]=Color;
00681                 return true;
00682         }
00683         else
00684         {
00685                 ostringstream ost;
00686                 ost << "CFloatImage::SetPixel" << Pos << " Outside image and border" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00687                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00688                 return false;
00689         }
00690 }

00728 inline int CFloatImage::GetMinX() const
00729 {
00730         if (ROIActive()==true)
00731                 return m_ROIUpperLeft.GetX();
00732         else
00733                 return -m_Image.Origo.x;
00734 }
00735 
00736 inline int CFloatImage::GetMinY() const
00737 {
00738         if (ROIActive()==true)
00739                 return m_ROIUpperLeft.GetY();
00740         else
00741                 return -m_Image.Origo.y;
00742 }
00743 
00744 inline int CFloatImage::GetMaxX() const
00745 {
00746         if (ROIActive()==true)
00747                 return m_ROILowerRight.GetX();
00748         else
00749                 return m_Image.Width-m_Image.Origo.x;
00750 }
00751 
00752 inline int CFloatImage::GetMaxY() const
00753 {
00754         if (ROIActive()==true)
00755                 return m_ROILowerRight.GetY();
00756         else
00757                 return m_Image.Height-m_Image.Origo.y;
00758 }
00759 
00760 inline CPoint2D<int> CFloatImage::GetOrigo() const
00761 {
00762         return CPoint2D<int>(m_Image.Origo.x,m_Image.Origo.x);
00763 }
00764 
00765 inline ORIGIN CFloatImage::GetOrigin() const
00766 {
00767         // get the origin of image
00768         return m_Image.Origin;
00769 }
00770 
00771 inline void CFloatImage::SetOrigo(UINT16 x, UINT16 y)
00772 {
00773         SetOrigo(CPoint2D<int>(x,y));
00774 }
00775 
00776 inline void CFloatImage::SetOrigo(const CPoint2D<int>& Pos)
00777 {
00778         m_Image.Origo.x=Pos.GetX();
00779         m_Image.Origo.y=Pos.GetY();
00780         if (m_ROIActive==true)
00781         {
00782                 m_ROIUpperLeft  -= Pos;
00783                 m_ROILowerRight -= Pos;
00784         }
00785 }
00786 
00787 inline bool CFloatImage::SetROI(const CPoint2D<INT32>& UL, const CPoint2D<INT32>& LR)
00788 {
00789         if ((UL.GetX()>=LR.GetX()) || (UL.GetY()>=LR.GetY()))
00790         {
00791                 ostringstream ost;
00792                 ost << "CFloatImage::SetROI() UL " << UL << " greater than LR " << LR << 
00793                         " in at least one of the dimensions" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00794                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00795                 return false;
00796         }
00797         // we check with the MinX, MaxX, MinY and MaxY without ROI
00798         INT32 MinXNoROI=-m_Image.Origo.x;
00799         INT32 MinYNoROI=-m_Image.Origo.y;
00800         INT32 MaxXNoROI=m_Image.Width-m_Image.Origo.x;
00801         INT32 MaxYNoROI=m_Image.Height-m_Image.Origo.y;
00802         if ((UL.GetX()<MinXNoROI) || (UL.GetY()<MinYNoROI) || 
00803                     (LR.GetX()>MaxXNoROI) || (LR.GetY()>MaxYNoROI))
00804         {
00805                 ostringstream ost;
00806                 ost << "CFloatImage::SetROI() UL " << UL << " or LR " << LR << 
00807                         " outside image dimensions: " << CPoint2D<int>(GetMinX(),GetMinY()) <<
00808                         " - " << CPoint2D<int>(GetMaxX(),GetMaxY()) << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00809                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00810                 return false;
00811         }
00812         m_ROIActive=true;
00813         m_ROIUpperLeft=UL;
00814         m_ROILowerRight=LR;
00815         return true;
00816 }
00817 
00818 } // end namespace ipl
